category: Articles of Incorporation/Article 30 (Handling of profits and losses)
contents: Article 30 (Handling of profits and losses) ① If there is a profit in the settlement of accounts for each fiscal year, the Foundation shall reserve the entire profit. ② If there is a loss in the settlement of settlement of each fiscal year, the Foundation shall compensate it with the reserves under paragraph 1. , when the reserves are insufficient, the government is requested to preserve them.
